info.title: Market Data API.
info.description: Documentation of the Market Data API.

get.summary: List all API keys for a user
get.description: Retrieves all API keys associated with the specified user ID.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The user ID to list API keys for

post.description: Creates a new API key with the specified name and permissions for the given user.

get.summary: Get chat history from BigTable.
get.description: Retrieves the chat history for the specified row key from BigTable.

parameters.name: rowKey
parameters.description: The row key to get chat history from

post.summary: Create a new chat in BigTable.
post.description: Creates a new chat conversation with the specified messages at the given row key.

parameters.name: rowKey
parameters.description: The row key to create chat at

delete.summary: Delete a chat key from BigTable.
delete.description:
Removes the specified row from the chat table in BigTable. The operation
is idempotent - attempting to delete a non-existent key will still return
a successful response.

parameters.name: rowKey
parameters.description: The row key to delete from the chat table

get.summary: Get current price and trading data for a stock symbol
get.description:
This will retrieve the most recent trade data for the specified stock symbol including
current price, bid/ask prices, trade size, and other market data from Redis.

get.summary: Get top K darkpool trends.
get.description:
Retrieves the top K darkpool trends based on the provided count and start date.
Data is fetched from cache if available, otherwise from the primary service.

parameters.name: k
parameters.description: Number of darkpool trends to return.

get.summary: Get daily darkpool trends for a specific ticker.
get.description:
Retrieves daily darkpool trend metrics for the specified ticker within the given date range.
If no dates are provided, defaults to the last 30 days.

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: The ticker symbol to fetch trends for.

get.summary: Get dark-pool trades for a ticker.
get.description:
Retrieves dark-pool trades in the requested date window with optional
price/size/value filters and consolidation.
If the query matches the pre-cached slice (last 10 days, default filters) the
result is served from Redis; otherwise it falls back to Bigtable.
Current price is attached in parallel.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of trades to return

get.summary: Get daily weighted average summary of dark-pool trades.
get.description:
Retrieves a day-by-day breakdown of darkpool trades showing weighted average price,
total daily trade value, and trade volume. Data is fetched directly from Bigtable
as we need raw unconsolidated trades for accurate calculations.

get.summary: Fetch a dashboard watchlist.
get.description: Retrieves the tickers or data associated with a specific dashboard watchlist ID.

parameters.name: watchlist_id
parameters.description: ID of the watchlist to retrieve.

get.summary: Get earnings data for next week
get.description: Retrieves earnings data for the upcoming week from the cache.

get.summary: Get entity holdings data.
get.description:
Retrieves holdings data for a specific entity, with optional filtering by ticker symbol and date range.
Returns enriched holdings data including fund names, entity names, and ticker symbols.

parameters.name: fund_id
parameters.description: Fund ID to fetch holdings for

parameters.name: entity_id
parameters.description: Entity ID to fetch holdings for

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: Ticker symbol to filter holdings for

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return

get.summary: Get Long-Term Growth (LTG) estimates for a ticker.
get.description:
Retrieves Long-Term Growth (LTG) estimate data for a given stock ticker.
An optional cutOff date can be provided to retrieve data as of that date.

parameters.name: cutOff
parameters.description: Optional cut-off date (e.g., 'YYYY-MM-DD') to retrieve estimates as of a specific date.

get.summary: Get most recent estimate metrics for a ticker and period.
get.description:
Retrieves the most recent estimate metrics (e.g., EPS, Sales) for a given stock ticker,
for a specified period type (ANN, QTR, or BOTH).
An optional cutOff date can be provided to retrieve data as of that date.

parameters.name: cutOff
parameters.description: Optional cut-off date (e.g., 'YYYY-MM-DD') to retrieve estimates as of a specific date.

get.summary: Get price target estimates for a ticker.
get.description:
Retrieves price target estimate data for a given stock ticker.
An optional cutOff date can be provided to retrieve data as of that date.

parameters.name: cutOff
parameters.description: Optional cut-off date (e.g., 'YYYY-MM-DD') to retrieve estimates as of a specific date.

get.summary: Get the Fear & Greed Index data.
get.description:
Retrieves the historical Fear & Greed Index data. It attempts to fetch
the data from the cache first (Redis). If the cache is missed or an error
occurs during cache retrieval, it falls back to fetching the data directly
from the source.

get.summary: Get fund holdings data.
get.description:
Retrieves holdings data for a specific fund, with optional filtering by ticker symbol and date range.
Returns enriched holdings data including fund names, entity names, and ticker symbols.

parameters.name: fund_id
parameters.description: Fund ID to fetch holdings for

parameters.name: entity_id
parameters.description: Entity ID to fetch holdings for

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: Ticker symbol to filter holdings for

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return

get.summary: Balance-sheet, cash-flow, income & ratios for many tickers across a year span.
Data for one specific year & reporting period (FY, Q1â€’Q4).
Same data as above but for one ticker.
Get futures data for a ticker.
get.description: Retrieves futures data for a specified ticker symbol within a given date range.

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: Ticker symbol for the futures data.

get.summary: Get G7 events data for next week
get.description: Retrieves G7 events data for the upcoming week from the cache.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start date for historical data (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: The end date for historical data (YYYY-MM-DD)

get.summary: Search investors by name prefix
get.description: Returns up to the first 100 investors whose names start with the supplied prefix.

get.summary: Get IPO data for next week
get.description: Retrieves IPO data for the upcoming week from the cache.

get.summary: Get Market Status
get.description: Fetches the current market status from Polygon.io and returns whether the market is considered open.

get.summary: Get top market stocks data.
get.description:
Retrieves the top market stocks data based on the specified type.
The type parameter determines whether to fetch top gainers, losers, or most active stocks.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of stocks to fetch (gainers, losers, or active)

get.summary: Get current market snapshot data for all available tickers
get.description: This will retrieve the market snapshot for all available tickers with their current price and today's change

get.summary: Get filtered news articles.
get.description:
Retrieves news articles based on specified filter criteria such as date range,
ticker symbol, search text, sentiment score, market impact, and  .
Supports pagination via the limit parameter.

get.summary: Get sentiment scores for a ticker.
Get a news article by ID.
get.description: Retrieves a news article by its unique ID.

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: The underlying ticker symbol (e.g., AAPL, TSLA, SPY)

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date for options expiration range (YYYY-MM-DD format)

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date for options expiration range (YYYY-MM-DD format)

parameters.name: contract_type
parameters.description: Type of contracts to return: 'call', 'put', or 'both'

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: The underlying ticker symbol (e.g., AAPL, TSLA, SPY)

parameters.name: ticker
parameters.description: The underlying ticker symbol (e.g., AAPL, TSLA, SPY)

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date for options expiration range (YYYY-MM-DD format)

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date for options expiration range (YYYY-MM-DD format)

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start date for historical data (YYYY-MM-DD)

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: The end date for historical data (YYYY-MM-DD)

get.summary: Get price forecasts for stock tickers.
get.description: Returns a map where each key is a ticker symbol and the value is an array of forecast data points.

parameters.name: tickers
parameters.description:
Comma-separated list of stock ticker symbols (e.g. AAPL,TSLA).
Up to 20 tickers. If omitted we default to AAPL,TSLA,AMZN,NVDA,MSFT,GOOG.

get.summary: Get the Risk Analysis Score data.
get.description:
Retrieves the historical Risk Analysis Score data. It attempts to fetch
the data from the cache first (Redis). If the cache is missed or an error
occurs during cache retrieval, it falls back to fetching the data directly
from the source.

get.summary: Search for entities.
get.description: Searches for entities based on a query term, field, mode, and limit.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

get.summary: Search for funds.
get.description: Searches for funds based on a query term, field, mode, and limit.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

get.summary: Search for Fsyms (stocks).
get.description: Searches for Fsyms (stocks) based on a query term, field, mode, and limit.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

get.summary: Get available financial metrics for screening.
get.description:
Returns a list of available financial metrics that can be used in
screening criteria. The list can be filtered by period type.

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: Period type to filter metrics (QUARTERLY, ANNUAL, or ALL)

post.summary: Screen stocks based on financial criteria.
post.description:
Filters stocks based on the provided financial criteria and returns
matching ticker symbols. The screening is performed against historical
financial data up to the specified cutoff date.

get.summary: Get Fibonacci retracement levels and Camarilla pivot points
get.description: This will calculate Fibonacci retracement levels and Camarilla pivot points for the specified stock symbol

get.summary: Retrieve ticker profile data.
get.description: Returns the JSON profile for the specified symbol.

get.summary: List all tracked tickers.
get.description: Returns the full list of symbols from cache or Bigtable.

get.summary: List tickers with their names.
get.description: Returns all tracked tickers and their profiles.

get.summary: Get current market data for default tickers
get.description: This will retrieve the current market data for a predefined list of popular stock tickers

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of trades to return

get.summary: Get treasury rates data for a date range
get.description:
Retrieves treasury rates data from Bigtable for the specified date range.
If no dates are provided, returns data for the current date.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Start date for the range (YYYY-MM-DD format)

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: End date for the range (YYYY-MM-DD format)

get.summary: Get volume footprint analysis for a stock symbol
get.description:
This endpoint provides detailed volume footprint analysis for all available trades including:
Price action analysis (OHLC, VWAP)
Volume distribution by price level
Order flow imbalances between buy and sell orders
Volume clusters indicating high activity zones
Absorption signals for potential exhaustion points
Point of Control (POC) - price level with highest volume
Value Area High/Low for 70% of traded volume
Delta percentage to gauge buying vs selling pressure

The analysis is based on all available trade data from Redis and calculates comprehensive
market microstructure metrics useful for understanding market dynamics.

post.summary: Fetch data for a list of tickers (watchlist).
post.description:
Retrieves data for a specified list of stock tickers within a given date range.
The request parameters are passed in the request body.

requestBody.description: Request body containing tickers and date range.

get.summary: Get stock split history for a specific ticker.
get.description: Retrieves the stock split history for a given ticker symbol from Bigtable.

400.description: // Assuming ErrorResponse is a defined model

ChatHistory.description: ChatHistory represents the full chat history

ChatMessage.description: ChatMessage represents a single message in a chat conversation

CreateChatRequest.description: CreateChatRequest represents the request body for creating a new chat

DarkpoolTrend.description: DarkpoolTrend represents a single ticker's darkpool activity for a day

absolute_volume_change.description: The percentage change in volume from previous date

prev_dollar_volume.description: The previous day's total dollar volume

prev_record_date.description: The date of the previous record

record_date.description: The date of the record in YYYY-MM-DD format

relative_volume_change.description: The percentage change in volume from previous date

total_dollar_volume.description: The total dollar volume of darkpool trades

total_volume.description: The total volume of darkpool trades for this ticker on this date

trend.description: Whether the volume trend is up, down, or flat

ErrorResponse.description: ErrorResponse represents a standardized error response format

dates.description: Array of available expiration dates in YYYY-MM-DD format

FilterRange.description: FilterRange represents min/max values for a numeric field

FuturesRowData.description: FuturesRowData holds the data for a futures price entry

HistoricalDataResponse.description: HistoricalDataResponse represents historical options data response

NewsArticle.title: NewsArticle represents a processed news article from Bigtable.

OptionsChainResponse.description: OptionsChainResponse represents the complete options chain data response

OptionsFilterRanges.description: OptionsFilterRanges contains min/max values for all filterable fields

PriceForecastItem.title: PriceForecastItem represents a single price forecast for a ticker.

StockSplitData.title: StockSplitData represents the data for a stock split.

execution_date.description: The date of the stock split.

split_from.description: The number of shares the stock was split from.

split_to.description: The number of shares the stock was split to.

TickerForecasts.description: The map key is the ticker symbol, and the value is a slice of forecast items.
TickerForecasts.title: TickerForecasts represents forecast data for each ticker symbol.

WatchlistDataRequest.description: Inferred schema for the watchlist request body.

APIKeyResponse.description: A successful response containing a list of API keys.

CreateAPIKeyResponse.description: A successful response containing the newly created API key.

ChatHistoryResponse.description: ChatHistoryResponse represents the successful response for getting chat history

CreateChatResponse.description: CreateChatResponse represents the successful response for creating a chat

CurrentPriceResponse.description: A successful response containing the current price data.

DarkpoolTrendsResponse.description: A successful response containing darkpool trends.

DailyDarkpoolTrendResponse.description: DailyDarkpoolTrendResponse represents the response for daily darkpool trends

DarkpoolTradeResponse.description: A successful response containing darkpool trades.

DarkpoolDailySummaryResponse.description: A successful response containing the daily summary of darkpool trades.

DashboardWatchlistResponse.description: A successful response containing the dashboard watchlist data.

EarningsResponse.description: A successful response containing earnings data.

EntityHoldingsResponse.description: A successful response containing entity holdings data.

FearGreedIndexResponse.description: A successful response containing Fear & Greed Index data.

FundHoldingsResponse.description: A successful response containing fund holdings data.

G7EventsResponse.description: A successful response containing G7 events data.

InvestorSearchResponse.description: A successful response containing a list of investors.

IPOsResponse.description: A successful response containing IPO data.

MarketStatusResponse.description: A successful response containing the current market status.

TopMarketStocksResponse.description: A successful response containing the top market stocks.

MarketSnapshotResponse.description: A successful response containing the market snapshot.

MetricsResponse.description: A successful response containing a list of available metrics.

ScreenResponse.description: A successful response containing the screener results.

FibonacciCarmiliaResponse.description: A successful response containing Fibonacci and Carmilia levels.

TickerProfileResponse.description: A successful response containing the ticker profile.

TickersListResponse.description: A successful response containing a list of all tickers.

TickersListWithNamesResponse.description: A successful response containing a list of all tickers with their names.

TickertapeResponse.description: A successful response containing the tickertape data.

TreasuryRatesResponse.description: A successful response containing treasury rates data.

Footprint.description: A successful response containing volume footprint analysis.

WatchlistDataResponse.description: A successful response containing data for the requested watchlist.

StockSplitsResponse.description: A successful response containing stock split history.

ErrorResponse.description: ErrorResponse is a generic error response structure.

EstimatesResponse.description: EstimatesResponseWrapper defines the standard wrapper for successful estimate API responses.

data.description:
Data field containing the actual estimate data.
The structure of Data can vary (e.g., object for single estimate, array for multiple).

FinancialsPeriodResponse.description: Successful response containing financial data for a specific period.

FinancialsRangeResponse.description: Successful response containing financial data for a range of years.

NewsResponse.description: A successful response containing a list of news articles.

X-News-Cache-Status.description: X-News-Cache-Status header indicating cache HIT or MISS

NoContentResponse.description: NoContentResponse represents a successful deletion with no content returned.

PriceForecastResponse.description: A successful response containing price forecasts.

RiskAnalysisScoreResponse.description: Successful response containing risk analysis score data.

TickerSentimentResponse.description: A successful response containing ticker sentiment data.

expirationDatesResponse.description: A successful response containing expiration dates.

historicalDataResponse.description: A successful response containing historical data.

optionsChainResponse.description: A successful response containing the options chain.

optionsFilterRangesResponse.description: A successful response containing the filter ranges for options.
